name: ASTEROIDS-ZENECA
description:
This is a fun experiment in vector graphics. It's tested on Chrome and Firefox on Android and Desktop.  I hope it works well for you.

This is a small experiment in vector graphics using HTML5 Canvas. You are a small ship flying through a world of coughing faces. If you give the faces doses of vaccine they become vaccinated and disappear (because they can go off and live their lives more normally now).  The clouds they cough out can block vaccine shots from getting through.

Nothing can hurt your ship. You never run out of life, time, or vaccine. Your score is stored in your browser and every time you come back you continue with the score you left off with.

Controls

Left Arrow / A Key
Rotate Left
Right Arrow / D Key
Rotate Right
Up Arrow / W Key
AccelerateSpace Bar
Fire

On screen buttons should appear on mobile browsers (this is experimental).

J Doubler 

If you get the J Doubler, your vaccine destroys clouds without being slowed down and it only takes 1 shot to vaccinate someone.
